script.title: CM360 Report Replicate
script.description: Replicate a report across multiple networks and advertisers.
instructions: Provide the name or ID of an existing report.
Run the recipe once to generate the input sheet called {recipe_name}.
Enter network and advertiser ids to replicate the report.
Data will be written to BigQuery > {recipe_project} > {recipe_slug} > {recipe_slug}_All

es.title: CM360 Informe Replicado
es.description: Replica un informe en varias redes y anunciantes.
instructions: Proporcione el nombre o la identificación de un informe existente.
Ejecute la receta una vez para generar la hoja de entrada llamada {recipe_name}.
Ingrese los ID de red y de anunciante para replicar el informe.
Los datos se escribirán en BigQuery > {recipe_project} > {recipe_slug} > {recipe_slug}_All

field.name: recipe_name
field.description: Name of document to deploy to.

field.name: recipe_slug
field.description: Name of Google BigQuery dataset to create.

field.name: report_id
field.description: CM template report id, for template

field.name: report_name
field.description: CM template report name, empty if using id instead.

field.name: delete
field.description: Use only to reset the reports if setup changes.

field.name: Aggregate
field.description: Append report data to existing table, requires Date column.
